NHSRC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Consultant Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 29, 2025, 16:30 IST
 National Health Resource Center
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 29-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 120,000 to 120,000




FOLLOW

The National Health Systems Resource Centre (NHSRC) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Consultant Jobs. Candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BDS, and BAMS can grab this chance and apply for the NHSRC Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Delhi.

NHSRC Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Consultant 	01	MBBS, BDS, BAMS

Age Limit for the NHSRC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 55 years.

Selection Process for the NHSRC Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the NHSRC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 1,20,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the NHSRC Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the NHSRC Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Consultant Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Then, submit the application form and capture the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	28-08-2025
Last Date of Application	23-09-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
